item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m Adam and I hope you can get some value out of the collection of information I’m building here. I’m currently a Software Development Engineer in Test with Workiva during the day and during the evenings I’m learning about a variety of subjects, relaxing, or honing some kind of skill. I would like to keep primarily focused on software development, but since this is the About section, I’ll list the other things that might come up every once in a while and below is a timeline of my experience with development.
